name: Drama
description: A genre that relies on the emotional and relational development of realistic characters.

name: Science Fiction
description: Films that explore futuristic concepts, advanced technology, space exploration, and often question what it means to be human.

name: Action
description: A genre of film that typically involves excitement, physical stunts, chases, fights, and explosions.

name: Comedy
description: Films intended to make the audience laugh, with a focus on humorous situations and characters.

name: Fantasy
description: A genre that incorporates magical elements, often set in imaginary worlds filled with mythical creatures and adventures.
